data.pricing_trends: Average daily costs range from $30 to $80 depending on accommodation and activities. Prices may rise in peak travel seasons.
data.booking_windows: Travelers should book at least 2-3 months in advance for the best deals, especially during holidays and festivals.
data.demand: Increasing interest in eco-tourism and cultural experiences has led to higher visits during the winter months.
data.competition: Alternative destinations include Costa Rica and Belize, but Guatemala offers unique cultural and historical experiences.
